headline: b'U.S. Judge Upholds Massachusetts Assault Weapons Ban'
snippet: b"A federal judge on Friday upheld a Massachusetts law banning assault weapons including the AR-15, saying the U.S. Constitution's Second Amendment guarantee of Americans' right to bear firearms does not cover them."

headline: b'A Trade War Will Test Corporate America\xe2\x80\x99s Openness: DealBook Briefing'
snippet: b'Companies mostly have not detailed the potential impact of Mr. Trump\xe2\x80\x99s trade policies. With first-quarter earnings imminent, will that now change?'
